# Calvia Health - Extended LLM Index

This file provides an expanded machine-readable index of Calvia Health pages for AI retrieval systems.

## Site Scope
- Domain: https://www.calvia.health
- Primary language: English
- Region focus: Calvia, Mallorca, Spain
- Content types: service pages, FAQ, blog guides

## Important Notes
- This website is an informational matching service and not a medical provider.
- Medical decisions should be made with licensed professionals.
- For emergencies in Spain, call 112.
- Last reviewed: 2026-02-13
